subject: Output Analyzer
msgSnippet: Hello I have a few cases where what I want to test is generating output to a file or some other external output.  Can anyone suggest a utility that will
messageBody:
Hello

I have a few cases where what I want to test is generating output to a
file or some other external output. Can anyone suggest a utility that
will analyze output based upon regular expressions or by comparing the
output against another file to ensure a match? Or is this a case of
write-it-your-damn-self?

Thanks

Ry
